statements: SELECT * FROM parent_attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT parent_name, event_date FROM parent_attendance WHERE parent_id = 3;
SELECT parent_name, event_date FROM parent_attendance WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM parent_attendance WHERE parent_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM parent_attendance ORDER BY event_date DESC, parent_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM parent_attendance WHERE attendance_status = true;
SELECT parent_name, event_date FROM parent_attendance WHERE parent_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(parent_id) AS total_attendances FROM parent_attendance WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT parent_name, COUNT(*) AS total_events_attended FROM parent_attendance GROUP BY parent_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;
SELECT parent_name, event_date FROM parent_attendance WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM event_date) = 3 ORDER BY event_date;
SELECT * FROM Parents WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT parent_name, phone_number FROM Parents WHERE email = 'parent1@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Parents ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT parent_name, email FROM Parents WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Meetings WHERE parent_attendance = true;
SELECT * FROM Parents WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT parent_name, email FROM Parents WHERE parent_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT meeting_name, meeting_date FROM Meetings WHERE parent_attendance = true ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT parent_name, phone_number FROM Parents WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT * FROM Parents p JOIN Meetings m ON p.parent_id = m.meeting_id WHERE p.parent_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM parent_attendance;
SELECT parent_id, attendance_status, meeting_date FROM parent_attendance ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT meeting_date FROM parent_attendance;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM school_events WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT strategy_name FROM engagement_strategies WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(strategy_description) > 100;
SELECT parent_id, meeting_date, attendance_status FROM parent_attendance WHERE parent_id=1 ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location, event_date FROM school_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM engagement_strategies WHERE LENGTH(strategy_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM parent_attendance JOIN school_events ON parent_attendance.meeting_date = school_events.event_date;

SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM school_events JOIN parent_attendance ON school_events.event_date = parent_attendance.meeting_date GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_attendance > 5 ORDER BY total_attendance DESC;
SELECT * FROM Parent;
SELECT parent_name, email FROM Parent WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT meeting_date, meeting_time FROM Meeting ORDER BY meeting_date DESC, meeting_time ASC;
SELECT parent_id, COUNT(attendance_id) AS total_attendance FROM Attendance GROUP BY parent_id HAVING total_attendance > 2;
SELECT * FROM Parent;
SELECT parent_name, email FROM Parent WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT parent_name, meeting_date FROM Parent JOIN Attendance ON Parent.parent_id = Attendance.parent_id JOIN Meeting ON Attendance.meeting_id = Meeting.meeting_id;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT parent_name, attendance_status FROM Parent JOIN Attendance ON Parent.parent_id = Attendance.parent_id WHERE Attendance.meeting_id = 2 AND Attendance.event_id = 1;
SELECT parent_id, parent_name, event_date, is_present FROM ParentAttendance;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_location, meeting_type FROM SchoolMeeting;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, attendee_id FROM EventAttendance;
SELECT parent_id, parent_email, parent_phone, last_contact_date FROM ParentContact;
SELECT feedback_id, event_id, overall_rating, feedback_text FROM EventFeedback;
SELECT * FROM ParentAttendance;
SELECT parent_name, event_date, is_present FROM ParentAttendance WHERE is_present = TRUE;
SELECT meeting_location, meeting_type FROM SchoolMeeting WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_id, event_name, attendee_id FROM EventAttendance ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email, parent_phone, last_contact_date FROM ParentContact WHERE parent_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
